weather_report:
The morning air carries the signature chill of winter, with the haze hovering gently as the sun stretches lazily across Downtown San Francisco. The day is breaking mostly sunny, a welcoming glow illuminating the cityscape, though a hint of fog still lingers along the periphery, weaving around the iconic silhouettes of landmarks like the Golden Gate Bridge. With temperatures peeking near sixty-two, falling to a cooler fifty-seven, the crispness in the breeze offers a refreshing contrast, while the soft whisper of the north-northwest wind keeps the air lively yet comfortable. 

As the sun rises higher, the haze will begin to dissipate, revealing a clearer horizon for those out and about—ideal for quiet walks through neighborhood parks or perhaps a leisurely coffee enjoyed outdoors. Tonight, the clouds will roll in, a reminder of the ocean’s presence, with temperatures dipping to around forty-seven, inviting light layers to keep the chill at bay. The tranquil evening calls for nurturing pursuits; perhaps a cozy gathering with friends or an intimate dinner at a nearby café, allowing the warmth of community to blend with the city’s twinkling lights. It is a day best savored, one that inspires calm amidst the bustling urban rhythm.
